content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a command to read the file "Atlas/executed_code/average.py" and successfully executed it. I then received a command to list all files in the directory "Atlas/executed_code" and saw a list of files. I was then given a command to write and append text to a new file "my_new_file.txt", which was successful. I was then given a command to replace text in the same file, but it returned an error due to an out of range occurrence index. I then received a command to read the same file and successfully executed it. I was then given a command to delete the file "my_new_file.txt" and successfully deleted it. Lastly, I received a command to append and replace text in the file "my_file.txt" and successfully executed both commands. I then received a command to delete the file "my_file.txt" and successfully deleted it.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: Hello, world!\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt", "text": "This is a new line of text."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt", "old_text": "This is a new line of text.", "new_text": "This is a modified line of text.", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "Atlas/executed_code"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: Hello, world!\n', type='action_result')]
"""
